nodes.text: Meelee was a young girl who was in attendance at the Festival of Four Honorings at Marblewood Estate on the planet Wukkar around 0 BBY during the Marblewood Estate heist. She bumped into Han Solo who used the contact as an excuse to drop a fake holocamera into a sand tornado as part of the heist he set up. Her parents did not realize that the impact had been staged and scolded the poor girl.
